name: Barbican
tagline: CMU Practicum Project Fall'14 - Trusted Cloud with Barbican
body:
### Welcome to Team BlueChip's Practicum Project Page.
In this project, we will develop an open source trusted cloud model with key management service using OpenStack Barbican project, backend key storage using KMIP Server and host integrity verification using OpenStack OpenAttestation project. 

###Authors and Contributors
Team BlueChip comprises of Divya Chandra Sekar (@divya-csekar), Deepti Sunder Prakash (@dsunderp), Marcelo Dominguez (@cortodemente) and Rashmi Krishnan (@rashmik8).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
